name: The Past, Present, and Future
description:
Hey, are you listening to me? My name is AIden, the AI assistant program built into your suit.  
And you are... well, you know who you are. ...Right?
Anyways, we should probably get to exploring this temple.  
Even though the Architects have been studying it for over a thousand years, they still need our help understanding some things.  
Temporal anomalies, levitating buildings, missing civilization sort of things.  
But with this suit’s time traveling capabilities, and my intellectual database of the Architects’ knowledge of this temple (but mostly my vast intellect), we should be able to finally understand what makes this place tick.

Now, let’s get to exploring this temple and figure out where exactly the Arbiter wanted to meet us.  The Arbiter said they needed our help with something in some place on the other side of the temple, but unfortunately, the boss wasn’t to clear about what that "something" was when I asked.
So... good luck?
